attributes.action: Make period products free in the UK
attributes.additional_details: 1 in 10 women are unable to afford period protection and are forced to improvise with devices that are unsafe/unhygienic. Scotland has already taken action and made period products free, and this easily solved issue is being ignored in the UK.
attributes.background: I would like women and girls in the UK to be offered free period products in all bathrooms.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Fund free female sanitary products, such as sanitary towels and tampons
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/555551
